abstract: It will be Asian, and it will serve hamburgers.
snippet: It will be Asian, and it will serve hamburgers.
lead_paragraph: Eric and Bruce Bromberg will be opening a Blue Ribbon restaurant this spring at the Thompson LES Hotel, in the space that had been Shang, which has closed. The news was reported yesterday by Amanda Kludt at Eater.

headline.main: Blue Ribbon Will Replace Shang in the Thompson LES Hotel
